actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The orca makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 14 (3d6+4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The orca can't use its keensense while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The orca's Perception is 18 when perceiving by hearing.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The orca can hold its breath for 30 minutes.
